name: Callum's Nightmare
description:
You wake up in an infinite maze,which You can escape by entering lower floors. ..Or can you?

Callum's Nightmare features procedurally generated mazes, first person combat, and (somewhat) spooky floating skeleton heads.

Your goal is to get to the end of each maze, by finding the ladder, You can find it easily by looking for a light on the mini map, while trying not to get eaten by the skulls.

This game is my submission for Callum Upton's game jam, the theme was HORROR.
